import React, { useState } from 'react'; const Contact = () => { const [form, setForm] = useState({ name: '', email: '', message: '' }); const [submitted, setSubmitted] = useState(false); const handleChange = (e) => { setForm({ ...form, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Here you can handle form submission (e.g., send to backend) setSubmitted(true); }; return (
